spoiler_log.Progressive Beam:
Area 1 - Bomb Room
Surface - East - Melee Tutorial Pathway
Area 1 - Inner Shaft
spoiler_log.Progressive Suit:
Area 3 - Interior (West) - Transport to Area 3 Interior East
Surface - East - Transport Storage
spoiler_log.Bomb: Area 2 - Entrance - Transport to Area 2 Exterior
spoiler_log.Progressive Jump:
Area 5 - Exterior - Dangerous Hallway
Area 6 - Chozo Seal West
spoiler_log.Metroid DNA 20: Area 3 - Interior (East) - Transport to Area 3 Interior West

hints.text: The Screw Attack can be found in Surface - East.
The Bomb can be found in Area 2 - Entrance.
A Progressive Beam can be found in Area 1.
A Progressive Beam can be found in Area 1.
A Progressive Suit can be found in Area 3 - Interior (West).
The Beam Burst can be found in Area 2 - Interior.
The Ice Beam can be found in Area 5 - Entrance.
A Progressive Jump can be found in Area 6.
The Phase Drift can be found in Area 2 - Exterior.
The Baby Metroid can be found in Area 4 - East.
